The last update killed the whole game as a desire to play it. For 6 years, dbd developers have not realized that it is necessary to change the selection of players, and not break the perks, it's so stupid. It is now impossible to play for solo surva at all, it's terrible. Killers make -4 in the first minutes on 5 genes. IT'S SO BALANCED (no) Thanks for taking all the perks from surv and making the game even more boring, now I just want to remove this shit

Ffs, just enable eac for linux already. 
It's not like you got a hyper competitive game that needs to have the best protection against cheaters.
It's a casual game and I would like to be able to play it on steam deck or on my Linux desktop through proton

Also fix you 60 fps lock, and by that I mean fix your ui animation being tied up to frame-rate and remove your frame lock. Any competent dev would know that Its a bad idea to do the ui like that, something that you guys seem to lack on some departments

Played the game at its basic level and i had a fair bit of fun. about 10-15 hours in when i broke out of the beginners bracket it was just loss after loss as a surviving, no enjoyment or dopamine. Or being ran circles around by players who'd downranked themselves from the top brackets to the lower ones for easy kills.

Plus having to level every killer to unlock the perks blows bigtime.

Dead by Daylight is a great game despite some issues. The game has two game modes where you can play as the killer and survivor. I play both fairly equally.

On the killer end, with this recent patch, it's a fair game regardless of your killer choice. It will take a long time to become a good killer since each has their own power and certain things need to be learned to do well. (I recommend watching others play). Killer can still become somewhat frustrating since survivors can (not always) make playing hell with certain builds but it's somewhat rare and the meta has been shaken up as of late. However, you may encounter a "bully squad" where they will blind you, stun you and run circles around you. It'll happen, but you'll get better at killer with time and it'll get a little less irritating. The one major downside to killer specifically is that each killer is so different you will end up spending money or time grinding for in game currency to play the killer you want. Perks from each killer is also a major contributing factor since most good killer perks are not on the basic set of killers you start with.

On the survivor end, things get a little weird. If you have a group of friends or even just one friend to play with, you'll have a good time. If you're solo, other teammates can be frustrating. However, this doesn't happen a lot for me. Sure people will make bad plays but that happens to everyone at some point. A lot of good survivor perks are available for free and which survivor you choose to play does not matter in the long run since they all function the same way unlike killers. Just pick the one you find cute and start leveling up each for perks to put on the survivor you like most. Much of the game is dictated by the killer you're matched up with which means you may encounter a killer that "tunnels" or "camps" you. Tunneling is when a killer targets one person specifically. This can be done in a toxic manner to get someone out the game as soon as possible or in a non toxic manner where the killer needs to confirm a kill to apply pressure on the survivors. Same goes for camping. It can be strategic for a killer to camp someone on hook if they see other survivors near the hook or think it would be beneficial. Or the killer could be toxic and camp you while there are 5 gens remaining. All of this will happen but it doesn't stop me from playing the game because the core game is good and it's not by any means every match.

At it's core DBD is a good game that I recommend giving a try.

je suis d√©soler de vous l‚Äôannoncer mais la derni√®re mise a jour viens de compl√®tement change le jeux si vous voulez jouer survivant oublier tout de suite vous n'y arriverait pas le seul moyen de vous amuser sur ce jeu c'est de jouer en tueur.
fun for beginners painful for experienced players

they upped gen repair speed to 90 secs like this shit is so boring, i get making changes to the perks but most of them are braindead like who tf thought it was a good idea to buff thana. facecamping and tunneling is more common and playing the killer is laughably easy while playing as surv, i already consider it a win if we get 2 gens done. is this the balanced changes they were talking about. they say reworking perks are to reduce tunneling but longer gens are just encouraging it ?? and thana legion is meta now which is even more of a pain in the ass than nurse so gj for introducing an annoying meta. solo queue is literally unplayable lol

thanks for the bloodpoints bonus though

edit: killer queues are HORRENDOUS

honestly not even fun anymore lulz killers either slug at 5 gens or camp and tunnel you out of the game. legion/plague with thana + three other gen slowdown/reg perks is so bad,, dead hard shouldve been nerfed yes. the meta needed a change yes. ive played both sides and it used to be much more fun just looping killers then having some downtime instead of constantly looking for someone to chase. killer mains out here complaining that survivors are getting a bloodpoint bonus but literally nobody wants to play survivor in this economy- even with the bp bonus its bad. ive seen people say "ur responsible for ur own fun not everyone elses" no but king listen if youre playing the game just to make people suffer,,, go touch some grass PLS like if everyones playing for fun why would you go out of your way to ruin it for everyone else lulz 

anyways this game used to be so fun but this update is just so flaccid i fr can see why the player base went from like 80k to 30k as fast as it did

(also saw someone say the game will live even if everyone leaves,,, killers are already complaining about queue times being so bad,,, breastie you cant play killer if there are no survivors playing LMAO)

This is my main streaming game so I can tell you this can be one of the most toxic communities but also one of the sweetest. I have had tons of fun with this and have learned not to take the games so personal. Better with friends but very fun regardless. I play both killer and survivor, some only play one side. It's usually on sale so definitely give it a try. Might be a bit grindy but after the newest patch they cut it down by 70%.

I played about 900 hours in this game, and let me tell you: this went from being my favorite, play-it-everyday game to absolutely despising it. Sure, maybe you can say I'm just bad at the game, or it's a skill issue, but it's absolutely awful now. 
In one day this game manged to become a worse shit-hole than it already was. It's not only just a completely toxic environment, but it's starting to become a killer sided game, with queue times being absolutely terrible. 

These changes have been the worse thing I've experienced to date, and I was fucking molested dawg. 0/10. Don't bother playing this game unless you're playing killer :^))))))
Very fun and enjoyable game. Not exactly balanced, but as balanced as any ordinary online-PVP game would be. Get heated at times, but overall I'd recommend it. Worth buying.
